Going to scale isn't about replicating the system, it's about exploring similar principles (and priorities?) @SirKenRobinson #sd36learn
Let's go back to this: A school is a community of learners, where we all come to learn from, with, about each other. @SirKenRobinson
Education needs to address the world around our learners but also the world within our learners. @SirKenRobinson #sd36learn #learnrevabby
Linear perspective of education and its hierarchy of disciplines forgets that culture requires a wide variety of experiences. #ArtsMatter
Invest in the Arts. Period.
